author: craigmcc
msg: Complete refactor of the property getting stuff that BeanUtils still had
duplicated from PropertyUtils.  Add method signatures in BeanUtils that
correspond to the getters in PropertyUtils -- the added value being that
BeanUtils will convert the result to a String for you.  Add deprecation
warnings on old method signatures that should be migrated.
Next step -- update the tag classes that use the deprecated to the new
versions, which will be required for nested/indexed setters to work
